title: The Intentional Marriage
itunes:author: Guest: Kevin Thompson
itunes:summary:
Couples who go the distance don't just drift into a successful relationship. Truth be told, it takes consistent effort to succeed in marriage. John, Erin and Greg share how you can stay intentional in striving for a great relationship with your spouse. Featuring Pastor Kevin Thompson.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "Friends, Partners and Lover" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-06-30?refcd=1430710

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/the-intentional-marriage/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/embracing-your-role-as-a-spouse-digital/?refcd=1430710

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
